# **My Lab Journal**

This is a template example for lab journaling. Students in the data science course at NIT will use this template to learn R for business analytics. Students can replace this text as they wish.

## How to use

1. Fork this repository for this website and follow the instructions on the README to get set up. [https://github.com/TUHHStartupEngineers/lab_journal_website](https://github.com/TUHHStartupEngineers/lab_journal_website)

2. Blog/journal what you are doing in R, by editing the `Journal.Rmd` file. See the [Journal page](https://tuhhstartupengineers.github.io/lab_journal_website/) for an example of what to do to get started learning R. Moreover, you can edit/add/remove files, that are listed in the navigation bar under class notes.

3. See the [links page](https://tuhhstartupengineers.github.io/lab_journal_website/Links.html) for lots of helpful links on learning R.

4. Change everything to make it your own.
